data.description:
Objective: Implement a full beads-backed adapter that satisfies the new contract.

Notes: Read/write/sync implementation can run in parallel; contract harness pass is the wave gate.

Assigned tasks:
- Implement beads adapter read/query operations
- Implement beads adapter write/mutation operations
- Implement beads adapter sync/history/lifecycle operations
- Add beads-to-domain translation for DTOs and errors
- Make beads adapter pass contract harness
